short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Receive calls, and manage contacts for your Chord.us accounts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chord's free personal edition makes it easy to stay connected from anywhere, no downloads required. Just share your permanent personal link to jump into high-quality video calls.

Chord is like having your own permanent online communications center.

Chord also makes it easy to spin up your very own decentralized community. Create spaces for friends, colleagues, employees, members, and more.

Sign up for free, build your personal room, create your community, and enjoy a completely new way to engage.

Visit chord.us to learn more.
